Keindahan Itu Bernama One Tree Hill
06 Nov 2019, 13:45 by Wahyu Setyo Widodo, Edwidhian Tri


One Tree Hill di New Zealand (Edwidhian Tri/detikcom)

Auckland - Sejuk dan hijau sejauh mata memandang. Itulah bayangan traveler tentang New Zealand. Tidak salah, karena keindahan seperti itu bisa dinikmati di One Tree Hill.Ada banyak pemandangan alam ajaib di New Zealand. Salah satunya ada di One Tree Hill. Lokasinya tak jauh dari Kota Auckland. Cukup berkendara naik mobil selama 20 menit, traveler sudah sampai di destinasi cantik ini.Tim detikcom dan Oppo Indonesia berkunjung ke One Tree Hill akhir pekan lalu. Semilir angin yang sejuk, cenderung dingin menyambut kedatangan kami siang itu.Sesuai dengan namanya, destinasi ini berupa bukit nan hijau dengan ketinggian sekitar 182 meter. Dalam bahasa lokal Suku Maori, mereka menyebut tempat ini sebagai Maungakiekie.


Foto: Edwidhian Tri/detikcom

Nama One Tree Hill diambil, karena dulunya di puncak bukit ini terdapat pohon Totara, pohon yang dianggap suci oleh Suku Maori. Namun sekarang, pohon tersebut sudah tidak ada dan digantikan oleh sebuah monumen obelisk.Obelisk ini jadi penanda makam John Logan Campbell, sosok yang sangat berperan dalam sejarah Auckland. John bisa disebut sebagai 'Bapak Kota Auckland'. Dalam wasiat terakhirnya, Campbell ingin dimakamkan di puncak bukti One Tree Hill.Dari puncak bukit ini, traveler bisa menyaksikan pemandangan 360 derajat Kota Auckland yang cantik dari ketinggian. Warga lokal biasa jalan-jalan dan olahraga ringan di destinasi ini saat akhir pekan.


Foto: Edwidhian Tri/detikcom

Aktivitas paling enak untuk dilakukan di bukit ini memang bersantai, duduk sejenak dan menghela nafas panjang. Rehat sebentar, sambil menghirup udara segar New Zealand jelas sesuatu yang layak dilakukan.Jangan lupa abadikan pemandangan hijau nan cantik sejauh mata memandang di One Tree Hill ini dengan kamera. Fitur canggih Oppo Reno2, ultra wide angle memungkinkan traveler untuk mengambil foto cantik One Tree Hill secara maksimal.Tak salah memang jika New Zealand disebut-sebut sebagai destinasi impian bagi sebagian traveler. One Tree Hill hanyalah satu keindahan dari berbagai keindahan lain yang bisa dilihat di New Zealand.Nantikan kisah perjalanan kami selanjutnya di New Zealand bersama Oppo Reno2.

That beauty is called One Tree Hill
06 Nov 2019, 13:45 by Wahyu Setyo Widodo, Edwidhian Tri


One Tree Hill in New Zealand (Edwidhian Tri / detikcom)

Auckland - Cool and green as far as the eye can see. That's the shadow of a traveler about New Zealand. Not wrong, because such beauty can be enjoyed at One Tree Hill. There are many magical natural landscapes in New Zealand. One of them is in One Tree Hill. The location is not far from the city of Auckland. Simply driving a car for 20 minutes, a traveler has arrived at this beautiful destination. The Indonesian team and Oppo Indonesia visited One Tree Hill last weekend. Cool breeze, tend to be cold to welcome us that afternoon. In accordance with its name, this destination in the form of a green hill with a height of about 182 meters. In the local language of the Maori, they call this place Maungakiekie.


Photo: Edwidhian Tri / detikcom

The name One Tree Hill was taken, because at the top of this hill there was a Totara tree, a tree that was considered sacred by the Maori Tribe. But now, the tree is gone and is replaced by an obelisk monument. The object is a marker of the grave of John Logan Campbell, a figure who was very instrumental in the history of Auckland. John can be called the 'Father of the City of Auckland'. In his last will, Campbell wanted to be buried atop the evidence of One Tree Hill. From this hilltop, a traveler can witness the beautiful 360 degree views of Auckland from a height. Locals usually take walks and light exercise at this destination on weekends.


Photo: Edwidhian Tri / detikcom

The best activity to do on this hill is to relax, sit for a moment and take a deep breath. A short break, while breathing in the fresh air of New Zealand is definitely something worth doing. Don't forget to capture the beautiful green scenery as far as the eye can see on One Tree Hill with a camera. Oppo Reno2's advanced features, ultra wide angle allow the traveler to take beautiful One Tree Hill photos to the fullest. It's not wrong if New Zealand is touted as a dream destination for some travelers. One Tree Hill is just one of the many other beauties that can be seen in New Zealand. Look forward to our next trip in New Zealand with Oppo Reno2.
